verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14663'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ

ل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Молюсь я не тому, Кому несете вы свои молитвы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':428'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ عَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِدُونَ م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَعْبُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ُ
verses.translation: И вы молебны свои шлете не Тому, Кому молюся я

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَنَا۟ عَابِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14664'>دٌ م</tajweed>َّا عَبَ<tajweed class='idgh_mus' data-type='idgham-mutajanisayn' data-description='Idgham - Mutajanisayn' data-tajweed=':14665'>د</tajweed>تُّمْ
verses.translation: И я не стану поклоняться тем, Кого вы выбрали себе для поклоненья

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':428'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ عَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِدُونَ م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَعْبُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ُ
verses.translation: И вы не станете молитвы совершать Тому, Кому молюся я

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِىَ د<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Несите же ответ за вашу веру, А за мою отвечу я пред Ним
